title: Get fresh date, time for A/L drama, theatre exam from nearest exam centre tomorrow
body_lines: The 2021(2022) GCE Advanved Level (A/L) candidates who weren't able to appear for the drama and theatre practical tests, have been requested visit the nearest examination centre tomorrow (May 7) to reserve another date and a time, the examinations department said.
Commissioner General L.M.D. Dharmasena said the said subject practical exams in Sinhala and Tamil media were to be held today.
Therefore, he requested the candidates to visit the nearest examination centre tomorrow to reserve another date and a time for their practical exams. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
